comments:
build i-2003-01-28 (1500), linux-gtk, ibm jre 1.3.1

I converted all my projects to PDE projects but then I realized that I didn't
want to convert my fragments. So when I synchronized with the server, I chose
Override and Update for their .project file which removed the pde nature and
builder from the project description. When I did this, I got the following error.
